text: Yesli by Allakh Vseznayushchiy uzrel by v nikh chto-nibud' blagoye dlya nikh samikh, dlya drugikh lyudey i dlya Yego Istiny, On by daroval im sposobnost' uslyshat', chto privelo by ikh k poznaniyu Istiny umom. No yesli by On i sdelal tak, chtoby oni uslyshali i ponyali eto, vso ravno oni by otvratilis' ot Istiny i pryamogo puti. Ved' oni predpochitayut svoi strasti i otvernulis' ot Allakha
